summary: Valentine’s website project intended to be published live with a short, valid domain name; user requests changing a UI prompt option label from “No” to “think about it” and re-sharing the updated live version.
architectural_notes: Domain/slug naming must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

existing_features.title: Update the Valentine question UI so the second option label currently displayed as "No" is changed to exactly "think about it" (keep the "Yes!" option unchanged). This includes the moving/avoiding button component used for the second option.

new_feature_requests.summary: Change the UI option label from “No” to “think about it” (keep “Yes”) and redeploy/share the updated site.
Rebuild and redeploy the updated frontend so the user can view/share the updated live version.

projectName: Change the 'No' option label to 'think about it'
